import './basket.scoped.css' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; import Footer from './../footer/footer' import Header from './../header/header' import url from '../../config' import axios from 'axios' import React, { Component, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, useParams, useLocation, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function useQuery() { return new URLSearchParams(useLocation().search); } const Basket=()=>{ const {local}=useParams(); const query= useQuery(); const [data, setData] = useState([]); useEffect( async ()=>{ const ur=local?local:""; let aa= axios.get(url +'/baskets?user_id'+JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('id_user')) ).then(res=> res.data); setData(aa); },[]) return (
